title: Most mercury enters food webs from coal burning

content.question: Which of the following is the most likely route for mercury to enter the food web?

choices.label: Municipal waste → landfill → groundwater → plants and vegetation
Coal-burning emissions → deposition → ocean → plankton → fishes
Organic fertilizers → soil → groundwater → lake → trout
Medical waste incinerators → stratosphere → grass → cows
Mining waste → acid deposition → surface runoff → plants and vegetation

content.answer: Coal-burning emissions → deposition → ocean → plankton → fishes
